title: 7 Days to Leave My Wife [Thai Movie]

Synopsis:
The story of a Thai-Chinese couple Yong and Ngak who&#039;s been together for 7 years. 
Yong is a saleman while his wife Ngak is just nothing but boring and old. 
There&#039;re many times that Yong thinks of breaking up, but he sweared to his grandfather 
that he will never leave Ngak or else his life will face bad luck. Later, there is a twist in 
his marriage life as Yong may has to break the word that he promised to his dead grandfather.
